item.description:
Join us for "From Bags to Riches"! Elise Miller will bring a wonderful assortment of adorable and affordable Beijo handbags. She can accept cash or checks.

Please bring your business cards for a raffle! (Of course, bring extra cards to give to each other!)

Our speaker will be the very accomplished Sheryl Dennis, partner of the law firm Fields and Dennis, in Wellesley. Fields and Dennis LLP, Attorneys at Law, specializes in all aspects of family law. They provide "Innovate solutions to complex family problems" (from their web site, which is www.fieldsdennis.com).

Sheryl herself is an expert in estate planning. This extremely important aspect of the law assists women and families to avoid paying (or over paying!) excessive or unnecessary taxes. As a financial advisor myself, I can highly recommend Sheryl as an extremely valued resource for me and my clients.

As always, light snacks will be provided.

See you there!

Cheers, Karen
617-650-8716
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.name: Estate Planning and More!
